profile.primary_concern: how my bipolar disorder might affect my ability to take PrEP consistently

context: The user is living with bipolar disorder, which influences her emotions and mindset towards managing her health. She often feels overwhelmed by the possibility of medication adherence and worries about stigma related to both her mental health and HIV prevention. Despite her concerns, she hopes to learn how PrEP can fit into her life without exacerbating her condition.
example_questions_clean: Nina wasiwasi kuhusu jinsi hali yangu ya akili itakavyoathiri ufanisi wa PrEP.
Je, ni njia gani bora za kuhakikisha naweza kuchukua PrEP kila siku?
Ninaweza kupata msaada gani wa kiakili wakati wa kutumia PrEP?
Je, kuna madhara yoyote ya kutumia PrEP na dawa zangu za bipolar disorder?
Nifanye nini ikiwa nitaona athari mbaya kwenye hali yangu ya akili?
Je, ni rahisi kupata PrEP nchini Kenya kwa watu wenye changamoto kama zangu?
